channel.title: Stop command teles in combat
channel.description:
i'm using delta source and i was wondering if anyone could give me the lowdown on this:
[code]case 69999: if inCombat = true; toX = absX = false; toY = absY = false; break;[/code]
thats the code i made for it but it's a bit off and where do i place it in client.java?
these r the errors i get: [code]client.java:15123: '(' expected if inCombat = true; ^ client.java:15123: ')' expected if inCombat = true; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
thanks,
---James---

item.title: Stop command teles in combat
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

i can code but ive never bothered trying that before… thanks anyway jordie
rep++ if u didnt have 200 otherwise its a waste

item.title: Stop command teles in combat
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Please at least try learning the BASICS of java before attempting something like this…

case 69999: if(!inCombat) toX = COORDINATE; toY = COORDINATE; break;

Read full topic
